# 50-microservice.txt - AUTOGENERATED, DO NOT MODIFY MANUALLY

# Set up microservice
RUN wget -q -O sdno-driver-ct-te-1.0.0-RC0.zip https://nexus.open-o.org/content/repositories/autorelease-1077/org/openo/sdno/driver-ct-te/ct_tedriver/1.0.0-RC0/ct_tedriver-1.0.0-RC0.zip && unzip -q -o -B sdno-driver-ct-te-1.0.0-RC0.zip && rm -f sdno-driver-ct-te-1.0.0-RC0.zip
EXPOSE 8670
RUN echo Open-O 1.0.0-RC0 autorelease-1077 > OPENO_VERSION
